mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CALENDAR (USER_ID, TITLE, START, END) VALUES (#{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, #{param4})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CALENDAR WHERE USER_ID=#{param1} AND TITLE=#{param2} AND START=#{param3} AND END=#{param4}
mapper.update: UPDATE CALENDAR SET START=#{param5}, END=#{param6} WHERE USER_ID=#{param1} AND TITLE=#{param2} AND START=#{param3} AND END=#{param4}
